text: Consequence (previously Consequence of Sound) is an independently owned online magazine that features news, editorials, and reviews of music, movies, and television. The magazine also has the Festival Outlook micro-site, which serves as an online database for music festival news and rumors. In 2018, Consequence of Sound launched Consequence Podcast Network. == References == Category:Magazines published in New York City Category:2007 establishments in Illinois Category:Companies based in Chicago Category:American entertainment websites Category:Websites established in 2007 Category:Online magazines
title: Consequence (publication)
